resource_notes: Identity Experience Framework (IEF) XML configuration is error-prone and requires deep specialized knowledge.
alternative_approach: Revert to standard B2C User Flows if custom policy complexity delays timeline > 3 days.
risk_factors: Single point of failure on Security Architect; blocks Backend Auth Strategy.
mitigation_strategy: Pair Security Architect with Backend Lead for knowledge transfer on token claims.

resource_notes: Requires optimization of spatial indexes to meet <100ms latency requirement.
alternative_approach: Use simplified bounding box logic first, then refine to precise polygon.
mitigation_strategy: Early load testing on spatial queries using k6.

resource_notes: Extremely sensitive to OS-level battery optimizations. Requires native code bridging.
alternative_approach: Use foreground service only if background permissions are rejected by App Stores.
risk_factors: High risk of process termination by OS.
mitigation_strategy: Start prototyping in Sprint 2 (ahead of schedule) to validate library selection.
